response.original_title: Final Fantasy XIV And Back Again
response.overview: Enjoy the soothing melodies of the piano performance by KEIKO from the first day of the show and rock out to the bone-shaking performance by FFXIV’s official band, THE PRIMALS, on the second day. Two live performances that filled the venue with both tear-jerking emotions and excitement are now packaged together into one Blu-ray, with new edits featuring transitions that were not available on the paid livestream.  In addition, you can enjoy behind-the-scenes footage from the FINAL FANTASY XIV Fan Festival 2024 in Tokyo.
response.title: Final Fantasy XIV And Back Again

titles.title: And Back Again- Live Performances from the FINAL FANTASY XIV Fan Festival 2024
